snippet: Results from a national testing program revealed a steady but incremental improvement in student performance during the Bloomberg era.
abstract: National Assessment of Educational Progress testing program results show picture of steady though incremental improvement in New York City student performance over span of Bloomberg administration; city students continue to perform below national average, both in absolute terms and in proportion of students achieving proficiency in either reading or math.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and MOTOKO RICH

lead_paragraph: Results from a national testing program revealed a steady but incremental improvement in student performance during the Bloomberg era.

headline.main: New York City Students Show Slight Gains on Test Scores
headline.print_headline: Small Testing Gains for City Students Continue Gradual Rise in Bloomberg Era
